Senator Robert Menendez said: The UK didn't just turn a blind eye to Abdelbaset al-Megrahi 's release- they cut deals that set the terrorist free. The UK and Scottish governments' repeated denials, even when confronted by specific and compelling evidence, get more ludicrous by the day. It is time that these governments launch independent investigations into the matter and put the wheels in motion to return Abdelbaset al-Megrahi to prison. Senator Frank Lautenberg said,`` More than a year after his release, Abdelbaset al-Megrahi remains Abdelbaset al-Megrahive while the authorities who set him free continue to dodge responsibility. Simon Cowell let me sing` Twinkle Twinkle Little Star' to him. He's so nice and I love him.'' Bethany passed away at a hospice the three days later. Simon Cowell 's spokesman Max Clifford said, He is really upset, he said what a beautiful little girl she was. He is just so sad, and sad for the whole family.
